title.value: Соотношение между объемами зарыбления карасем серебряным естественных водоемов Беларуси и его промысловым изъятием
The relationship between silver crucian stocking volumes and its fishing seizures in natural water reservoirs of Belarus

journal.title: Belarus Fish Industry Problems : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Rizevskij, V.K., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). The Scientific and Practical Center for Bioresources
Zubej, A.V., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). The Scientific and Practical Center for Bioresources

abstract.value: Carassius auratus gibelio is characterized with wide prevalence and great number in the water reservoirs of the Republic of Belarus. Nowadays it is one of the most popular industrial fish species of natural water reservoirs of the country. The main goal of the research appears discovery of the correlations between volumes of fish stocking and its industrial seizures. Total volume of fish planting with stocking material of Carassius auratus gibelio in natural water reservoirs of the Republic of Belarus for 10 years is analyzed; interrelation between socking and industrial seizures for the period of 2001-2010 is evaluated. Comparison of the both stocking and catching of the Carassius auratus gibelio is analyzed. The following conclusions are made: there is a clear disproportion between the silver crucian stocking volumes and its fishing seizures in natural water reservoirs in the Republic of Belarus. More than a third (33.9) of the total commercial catch of these species is attributed to the lake Chervonoye (Gomel region), the stocking volume of which composes only 5%.
